p:
Samples were prepared for multi-proxy analysis using the standard preparation method for sub-fossil extraction
49 . B. Braunii, Pediastrum sp. and charcoal concentrations were determined by the addition of tablets containing a known concentration of Lycopodium spores to each sample prior to counting and calculated following standard protocols
50 . Organic, Carbonate and Silicate content of the cores was analysed by loss-on-ignition
51, 52 .
